test

Class KitMatchers

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.KitMatchers

  • public class KitMatchers
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains Matchers that are not provided #org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers but needed by a test.
    Since:
    02.02.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joshua Gleitze

    • Method Detail

      • containsExactlyDividedBy

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String> containsExactlyDividedBy(java.lang.String[] substrings,
                                                              java.lang.String divider)
        Creates a matcher that matches if the examined String contains exactly the elements in the specified String Array, separated exactly by divider.
        Parameters:
        substrings - the substrings that the returned matcher will expect to be contained by any examined string
        divider - the divider String that the returned matcher will expect the Strings of substrings to be divided by in any examined string

      • suits

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.Integer> suits(SystemExitStatus systemExitStatus,
                                            boolean mandatory)
        Creates a matcher that matches if the examined Integer suits the needs implied by systemExitStatus.
        Parameters:
        systemExitStatus - The exit status any examined Integer is expected to match
        mandatory - Whether it was mandatory for the tested class to call System.exit the way defined by SystemExitStatus.

      • hasExcactlyThatMuchLines

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String[]> hasExcactlyThatMuchLines(int outputLines,
                                                                java.lang.String outputDescription)
        Creates a matcher that matches if the examined String array contains exactly as much elements as specified by outputLines. This matcher is meant to assert a tested class' output. It provides a appropriate error message.
        Parameters:
        outputLines - How many lines the tested class should print.
        outputDescription - A description of the output that was expected from the tested class.

      • anyOfRemaining

        public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String> anyOfRemaining(java.util.List<org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String>> matchers)

      • inAnyOrder

        public static java.util.List<org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String>> inAnyOrder(java.util.List<org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.lang.String>> expectedOutput)
